name: Anushka
greetingText: The beautiful soul I came across!!
wishText: My wonderful friend. I have come to understand that living is fulfilling with you. You are a blend of everything I want in a friend. May this be your happiest day in life, and others will follow suit. I am happy for you as you add one more year, many more years of good health and sound mind for you. Happy birthday to you my beautiful friend. I cherish you forever. ;)
